issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Build kitchensink with the build mentioned in the environment & install it on ipad 3 iOS 6.0.1
2.Go to baseui -> views -> imageview -> basic.
3.Look at the appcelerator logo image.
4.Also goto baseui -> views -> imageview ->remote image.
5.Look at the appcelerator logo image.
6.Tap on 'assign remote url'
7.Look at the second appcelerator logo image which just came up.

Actual result:
1.Its appears to be stretched.

Expected results:
1.It should not appear stretched.

The issue is also seen in the following kitchensink test cases:
*Base_UI -> views -> remote URL
*Base_UI -> Image views -> Image Scaling
*Base_UI -> views --> table views -> table with remote image
fields.summary: KitchenSink: The image for appcelerator logo appears stretched
fields.environment:
Titanium studio : 3.0.0.201212112036
SDK Version : 3.0.0.v20121211130203
OS : OSX 10.8.2
KS : 3.0.0 GA
xcode 4.5.2
Ipad 3 iOS 6.0.1

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
